wikitext.*:
The '''Third Age''' can refer to:

==Middle-earth==
*'''[[Third Age]]''', the era between the first fall of [[Sauron]] and his final destruction.
**[[:Category:Third Age years|Any year within the Third Age]].

==Books==
*''[[Of the Rings of Power and the Third Age]]'', the last chapter of ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
*''[[The End of the Third Age]]'', the short version of ''[[Sauron Defeated]]'' that formed the fourth, and last, part of ''[[The History of The Lord of the Rings]]''.
*The End of the Third Age, published as Book VI in some editions of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

==Adaptations==
*''[[Battles of the Third Age]]'', an expansion pack to ''[[War of the Ring (board game)]]''.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age]]'', a [[2004]] game by [[Electronic Arts]].
*''[[Third Age of the Sun]]'', a [[2005]] album by [[Battlelore]].
*''[[Third Age: Total War]]'', a [[2009]] strategy [[:Category:Modifications|game mod]].
*''[[The Last Days (of the Third Age of Middle-earth)]]'', a [[2011]] action RPG [[:Category:Modifications|game mod]].

==People and groups==
*[[The Third Age (Modding Community)]], a large modding community that hosts mods for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology]]''
